meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>order</kanji> that you are <kanji>rank</kanji>ed in is your <vocabulary>ranking</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>standing</vocabulary> amongst others on a list. Beat that high score, Ryu!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
